title: Average living space of PRH tenants Hong Kong 2007 to 2019
yAxis: Average living space in square meters per person
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average living space in square meters per person, with a total of 7 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely positive which exists from 2018 to 2007.
Additionally, the next significant trend is slightly neutral which exists from 2019 to 2018.
